description: This file defines core dependency setup functions for a FastAPI application, including CORS configuration and plan limit enforcement dependencies. It imports external modules from FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, and project internal modules for configuration, database, security, models, and subscription services.

methods.name: List[str] _normalize_cors_origins(origins: List[str] | List)
methods.description: Normalizes the CORS origins input, allowing either a list or a comma-separated string, returning a list of strings.
